summary: This spell lets you summon a quiver of Bound Arrows, and shoot them with the bow of your choice.
descriptionHtml:
Do you like the ghostly blue arrows that come with the Bound Bow spell, but prefer to use your own bow? Or are you just tired of running out of arrows? Use this Adept level Conjuration spell to summon a quiver of 100 bound arrows for 4 minutes. The arrows are exactly the same as the ones from Bound Bow, i.e. they have the same stats as Daedric Arrows. The spell will end if you equip any other arrows.

The spell tome can be found on a table at the top of Valtheim Towers. It has also been added to the relevant leveled lists so it will appear in stores and random loot.

Spanish translation here, courtesy of johnyrisu: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33454

Update: Version 1.2 fixes the missing sound effect when the arrows are conjured.

Tested with Skyrim 1.8

This mod conflicts with the mod Auto Unequip Ammo mod. If you have both mods active then the Bound Arrows will often be replaced by regular arrows from your inventory when you equip a bow.
author: Spectacle
